name: siberiumlab-geth.dnp.dappnode.eth
shortDescription: SiberiumLab testnet is an Ethereum based L1 blockchain
description:
Geth version for the SiberiumLab Test Network. SiberiumLab is a cross-client, syncing, Geth, Nethermind and Erigon. This network is a community-based project, completely open-source, naturally. It was born in 2023 and has been growing in contributors ever since. More info [here](https://siberium.net/).
